data.title: Initial MVP Release
data.description: The first version of our app, featuring the core functionality.

data.title: December update
changes: Text Editor: Introduced a new text editor for enhanced drafting.
Autosave: Implemented autosave functionality to prevent data loss.
New Options: Added options for 'Pin', 'Delete', 'Duplicate', and 'Open in New Tab'.
Bug Fixes: Resolved various bugs to improve overall stability.
Profile Settings: Launched a new Profile Settings page, laying the groundwork for future features.
Rearrangement: Activity Feed is now divided into ‘Proposals’ and ‘Discussions’.
Proposals Integration: Full integration of Snapshot and Tally proposals for Arbitrum. Agora for Optimism.
Proposal Filter: Added a new filter feature for easier proposal management.
